CustomField.description: The statement that most accurately represents the status of the studentâ€™s developmental screening, received between the ages of 3 and 4 years of age
CustomField.label: MTSMCA Developmental ScreeningStatus

value.fullName: My student completed this screening through my resident school district.
value.label: My student completed this screening through my resident school district.

value.fullName: My student participated in the screening but we refused portions of the screening due to conscientiously held beliefs and submitted a statement as such to the district.
value.label: My student participated in the screening but we refused portions of the screening due to conscientiously held beliefs and submitted a statement as such to the district.

value.fullName: My student was not screened as during the recommended ages.
value.label: My student was not screened as during the recommended ages.

value.fullName: My student was not screened as we were not residents of Minnesota during this time.
value.label: My student was not screened as we were not residents of Minnesota during this time.

value.fullName: My student was not screened by the resident school district because I submitted an alternative comprehensive screening to the district.
value.label: My student was not screened by the resident school district because I submitted an alternative comprehensive screening to the district.
